topics.body:
"@trashboat":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/557670296368722f25000a23#post_557670296368722f25000a23
Here's a secret to all art: Fucking no one starts out brilliant except the rare natural geniuses. The only way anyone improves at anything is to keep practicing.

I guaran-fucking-tee that any artist has produced drawings that they think are absolute ass and will never show anyone.

Do not feel discouraged by doing badly, that is the first step to being great.
